document.full_text: the u.s. postal service posted a $2.2 billion net loss in its second quarter and said it might be unable to pay its debts by september.
document.title: u.s. post has $2.2 billion loss, warns of sept insolvency
lines_and_colors: the u.s. postal service posted a $2.2 billion net loss in its second quarter and said it might be unable to pay its debts by september.
